channel.title: Follow Up on Ticki's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Follow Up on Ticki's blog

item.title: Why Rust's `std::collections` is absolutely fantastic
item.description: My last blog post was about all the short-fallings and problems std::collections has. This post will be about the opposite: all the good things about std::collections and what other languages can learn from Rust. This post is a part of an on-going series of posts criticizing and praising various parts of Rust. The philosophy of std::collections Rust has an intentionally small set of collections. This has both advantages and disadvantages.
